bitfield.description: Wakes-up Page 1, Port 0 or 1. Writing 0 to this field has no effect on Page 1. Writing a 1 to this field wakes-up the page from the power-down state.

bitenum.description: Wakes-up the page from the power-down state

bitfield.description: Wakes-up Page 0, Port 0 or 1. Writing 0 to this field has no effect on Page 0. Writing a 1 to this field wakes-up the page from the power-down state.

bitenum.description: Wakes-up the page from the power-down state

bitfield.description: Wakes-up Page 1, Port 0 or 1. Writing 0 to this field has no effect on Page 1. Writing a 1 to this field wakes-up the page from the power-down state.

bitenum.description: Wakes-up the page from the power-down state

bitfield.description: Wakes-up Page 0, Port 0 or 1. Writing 0 to this field has no effect on Page 0. Writing a 1 to this field wakes-up the page from the power-down state.

bitenum.description: Wakes-up the page from the power-down state

bitfield.description: Places page 1, Port 0 or 1 in power-down state Writing 0 to this field has no effect on page 1 Writing 1 to this field places the page in power-down state

bitenum.description: Places the page in power-down state

bitfield.description: Places page 0, Port 0 or 1 in power-down state Writing 0 to this field has no effect on page 0 Writing 1 to this field places the page in power-down state

bitenum.description: Places the page in power-down state

bitfield.description: Places page 1, Port 0 or 1 in power-down state Writing 0 to this field has no effect on page 1 Writing 1 to this field places the page in power-down state

bitenum.description: Places the page in power-down state

bitfield.description: Places page 0, Port 0 or 1 in power-down state Writing 0 to this field has no effect on page 0 Writing 1 to this field places the page in power-down state

bitenum.description: Places the page in power-down state

bitfield.description: Reports power-down status for Page 1, port 0 or 1 Reading 0 from this field means Page 1 is in normal state Reading 1 from this field means Page 1 is in power-down state
Reports power-down status for Page 0, port 0 or 1 Reading 0 from this field means Page 0 is in normal state Reading 1 from this field means Page 0 is in power-down state
Reports power-down status for Page 1, port 0 or 1 Reading 0 from this field means Page 1 is in normal state Reading 1 from this field means Page 1 is in power-down state
Reports power-down status for Page 0, port 0 or 1 Reading 0 from this field means Page 0 is in normal state Reading 1 from this field means Page 0 is in power-down state
